data.message: Hello FB team and I have a suggestion. When I type something in the search bar, it just shows the list of the results, no any direct link to the page or people. It's really inconvenient. I want to browse freely with one click, just like the old times. Why are you making facebook even worse everyday? I hope you'll read my comment.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Tugs. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2l85URP. -Rhea
